4 Footnotes Footnotes are supported using the typical Markdown format: This sentence has a footnote.^[Here I am!] The result: This sentence has a footnote.1 The footnotes are shown in-line using bigfoot.js. Simply click on the footnote to show a popover window that contains the footnote. Here I am!↩︎

Page not found The page you requested cannot be found (perhaps it was moved or renamed). You may want to try searching to find the page's new location, or use the table of contents to find the page you are looking for.
